title: John Fetterman continues triggering the Left with his hilarious take on how "pinko" Harvard has gotten
description:
No, he is not a secret conservative. And there could very well be a cynical reason why the Pennsylvania Senator is sounding more rationale we'll get to in a minute. But until he has an opponent for 2028, I'm going to enjoy John Fetterman whenever her dumps on things that the Left holds dear. Today, it's his alma mater Harvard.

The institute of high "education" has been in the news thanks to now former president Claudine Gay. After not being fired for being an antisemite or a plagiarist, she resigned over the distraction people being mean about her be

title: Watch: Pat McAfee calls out BY NAME the ESPN executive “actively trying to sabotage” his show
description:
To the extent that there was ever a honeymoon between Pat McAfee and ESPN, it is over. The NFL star turned podcast icon turned ESPN star accused the network of sabotaging his show, and called out a vice president BY NAME he believes is doing so.

It was in reference to this NY Post article, saying that McAfee ratings allegedly aren't worth the headache for the network. Coincidentally, this was the day after Aaron Rodgers said how much he'd love it to see Jimmy Kimmel's name in the Epstein files. McAfee addressed the issue, going the Howard Stern/Pig Virus route. Live on air, he called out Norby Willia
